name: F-1 Sensation
description: F-1 Sensation (エフワン センセーション), released in Europe as Formula 1 Sensation, is a 1993 racing video game by Konami for the Family Computer, and a Formula One licensed product. It is heavily based on their 1988 MSX2+ title, F-1 Spirit 3D Special. It was Konami's final original Famicom game before re-releases.
